text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses remedies available upon success in UK legal action, including the option for damages. Under section 8 ('Remedies you might expect if you succeed (UK)'), it lists 'Damages or an account of profits' and explains that 'Damages: compensation for your loss (e.g., lost sales) and possibly damage to brand' and 'Account of profits: disgorgement of the infringer\u2019s profits attributable to infringement' are available. This directly satisfies the criterion requiring advice that the court can order an Inquiry as to Damages (or Assessment of Damages) to quantify the final monetary remedy if damages are chosen.", "criterion_id": "ed5318c8-5a19-4ea7-8275-294ca2b150f6"}
